## About Us

Farrell Roofing is a family-owned roofing company based in Tupelo, Mississippi, serving Northeast Mississippi since 2010. We specialize in residential roofing services including roof replacement, repair, inspection, storm damage restoration, and gutter services. Our team has 20+ years of combined roofing experience.

## Services (Detailed)

### Roof Replacement
- Complete tear-off and installation of new roofing systems
- Price range: $8,000 - $25,000 (typical residential)
- Timeline: 1-3 days for most homes
- Includes old roof removal, decking inspection, underlayment, new shingles/metal, flashing, ridge vents, and cleanup
- Materials: GAF Timberline HDZ, Owens Corning Duration, CertainTeed Landmark Pro, standing seam metal

### Roof Repair
- Fix leaks, damaged shingles, flashing issues, and other roofing problems
- Price range: $300 - $3,000
- Timeline: Same day to 1 day
- Includes damage assessment, targeted repairs, and quality verification

### Roof Inspection
- Professional assessment of roof condition with detailed written reports
- Price range: $150 - $400 (often free with repair/replacement)
- Timeline: 1-2 hours
- Includes exterior visual inspection, attic inspection, photo documentation, and written condition report

### Gutters & Drainage
- Seamless gutter installation, repair, gutter guards, and downspout extensions
- Price range: $1,000 - $5,000
- Proper drainage protects foundation and prevents water damage

### Roof Maintenance
- Preventive care programs to extend roof lifespan
- Price range: $200 - $500/year
- Includes biannual inspections, debris removal, minor repairs, and gutter cleaning

### Emergency Repair
- 24/7 emergency response for storm damage and urgent leak issues
- Immediate tarping and temporary repairs to prevent further damage
- Insurance claim documentation and assistance

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How much does a new roof cost in Mississippi?
Most residential roof replacements in Northeast Mississippi cost between $8,000 and $25,000, depending on roof size, pitch, material choice, and complexity. Use our free online estimator for a personalized estimate.

### How long does a roof replacement take?
Most residential roof replacements are completed in 1-3 days, weather permitting. Larger or more complex roofs may take additional time.

### Do you offer financing?
Yes, we offer flexible financing options with terms from 3 to 10 years. Pre-qualification is available with no impact on your credit score. Visit https://smartroofpricing.com/financing to calculate monthly payments.

### Do you help with insurance claims?
Yes. We provide free storm damage inspections, detailed documentation for insurance claims, and can work directly with your insurance adjuster. Visit https://smartroofpricing.com/insurance-help for free resources.

### What roofing material is best for Mississippi?
Architectural asphalt shingles are the most popular choice for Mississippi homes, offering good value and 18-22 year lifespan. Metal roofing is increasingly popular for its 40-60 year lifespan, energy efficiency, and superior storm resistance. See our comparison guide at https://smartroofpricing.com/blog/asphalt-vs-metal-roofing.

### Are there programs to help pay for a new roof?
Yes, multiple federal, state, and nonprofit programs exist including FEMA disaster relief, USDA rural repair grants, FHA Title I loans, and Habitat for Humanity. Visit https://smartroofpricing.com/assistance-programs to check your eligibility.

### How do I know if I need a new roof?
Key warning signs include: age over 15-20 years, curling/buckling shingles, missing shingles, excessive granules in gutters, daylight visible through attic, sagging roof deck, and increasing energy bills. See our detailed guide at https://smartroofpricing.com/blog/signs-you-need-new-roof.
